version_description:
1. Now compatible with iOS11 and new phone sizes!
2. Perks system has been completely re-done to allow more perks and make the game more exciting!
3. Magic inventory system has been completely re-done to be less infuriating and more copacetic! Fear this!
4. New Perks! New unlockables! New spells!
5. Switched to ad driven (ads can be turned off with a one-time purchase)
6. Settings have been completely re-done, you will be amazed.

o Many crashes fixed
o Unlock the devastating Call Comet spell!
o Game will now letterbox correctly on iPad
o Skill recharging will now reset when you start a new game
o Everweld Perk now works correctly
o Some fates can be disabled in settings.
